title: A Group of Men, and Other Sketches

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of black crayon, over traces of charcoal, on ivory laid paper.

medium_display: Black crayon, over traces of charcoal, on ivory laid paper
credit_line: Given in memory of Tiffany Blake
publication_history:
Lionello Venturi, "Quelques Dessins de Daumier," Art Quarterly I (Winter 1938), pp 50 and 52, fig. 5.

K. E. Maison, Daumier Drawings (New York, 1960), p. 22, no. 62 (ill.).

K. E. Maison, Honoré Daumier: Catalogue Raisonné of the Paintings, Drawings, and Watercolors, 2 (Greenwich, Conn., 1968), p. 259, no. 794, pl. 209.

Harold Joachim, French Drawings and Sketchbooks of the Nineteenth Century in The Art Institute of Chicago (Chicago, 1979), no. 2D6.
exhibition_history:
Paris, Galerie Durand-Ruel, "Exposition des Peintures et Dessins de H. Daumier," 1878.

New York, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, "French Drawings in American Collections," February 3-March 15, 1959, cat. 108, pl. 13; traveled to Paris, the Musée de Orangerie; and Rotterdam, the Boymanns Museum.

Northampton, Mass., Smith College, "Daumier: An Exhibition of Paintings, Drawings, Sculpture, and Prints,"  October 6-29, 1961, cat. 19.

New York, Wildenstein and Company, "Master Drawings from The Art Institute of Chicago," October 17-November 30, 1963, cat. 88, pl. xxxiv.

The Art Institute of Chicago, "A Quarter Century of Collecting: Drawings Given to The Art Institute of Chicago, 1944-1970 by Margaret Day Blake," April 28-June 7, 1970, n.p., cat. 29 (ill.).

Urbana-Champaign, Ill., Krannert Art Museum, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, Drawings from the Collections of The Art Institute of Chicago, April 23–May 14, 1972.

Frankfurt am Main, Städtische Galerie im Städelschen Kunstinstitut, Graphische Sammlung, "Honoré Daumier: Zeichnungen," November 17, 1992-January 17, 1993, pp. 233-234, cat. 118 (ill.), cat. by Colta Ives, Margret Stuffmann, Martin Sonnabend, et. al.; traveled to New York, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, February 26-May 2, 1993.

Paris, Galeries Nationales du Grand Palais, "Daumier," October 5, 1999-January 3, 2000, p. 467, cat. 309 (ill.); Ottawa, Canada, Musée des Beaux-Arts, June 11-September 6, 1999; and Washington D.C., The Phillips Collection, February 19-May 14, 2000.

London, Royal Academy of Arts, "Daumier: Visions of Paris", October 26, 2013 - January 26, 2014,  pp. 20, 126-127, cat 67 (ill.).
provenance_text: Galerie Ambroise Vollard (1867-1939), Paris [Maison 1968].  Carstairs Gallery, New York [Maison 1968].  Given by Richard H. Zinser, New York, to the Art Institute, 1948.

input: A Group of Men, and Other Sketches
